metadata.title: CVE-2019-17002 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
If upgrade-insecure-requests was specified in the Content Security Policy, and a link was dragged and dropped from that page, the link was not upgraded to https. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 70.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17002` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 70.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '70.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
